title: SHIFTING OR SHUNTING OF RAIL VEHICLES  (shifting vehicles in general B60S; marshalling systems B61B)
definition_statement: This place covers: Devices and methods for moving a railway vehicle intra-yards.

title: Turntables; Traversers; Transporting rail vehicles on other rail vehicles or dollies  (shunting B61J3/00)
